name: Mass Relocating Robot
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ There are 5 different Mass Relocating Robots. Each one requires a different Instruction Disc or Programmed Photon Particle Emitter. The weapon PPPE's drop from level 10-30 mobs, the Shape Hard/Soft Armor PPPE's are harder to find as they drop from QL 60 dyna and mission bosses. #L "Robot Instruction Disc (Improve Crushing Weapons)" "155906" #L "Robot Instruction Disc (Improve Thrusting Weapons)" "155907" #L "Robot Instruction Disc (Improve Slashing Weapons)" "155533" #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Hard Armor)" "162221" #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Soft Armor)" "162222" #L "Symbol Library - Space" "144790" #L "Photon Particle Emitter" "144812" #L "Ultimate Mass Relocating Robot" "155592" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Note: When making a Weapon MRR, you will need to upgrade the Robot Instruction Disks to Programmed Photon Particle Emitters like this: Robot Instruction Disc (Improve Crushing Weapons) + Symbol Library - Space = #L "Robot Compiled Algorithm (Improve Crushing Weapons)" "155903" Skills: | 4 x QL of the Instruction Disk in NP and CL | Note: QL of the Symbol Library must be at least 25% of the Robot Instruction Disk Robot Compiled Algorithm (Improve Crushing Weapons) + Photon Particle Emitter = #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Improve Crushing Weapons)" "155905" Skills: | 4.25 x QL of the Instruction Disk in NP | Note: QL of the Photon Particle Emitter must be at least 50% of the Robot Instruction Disk ------------------------------ Now combine your PPPE (XXX) with an Ultimate Mass Relocating Robot: Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Improve Crushing Weapons) + Ultimate Mass Relocating Robot = #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Improve Crushing Weapons)" "155924"
